title: Rhythm Knight
description: Rhythm Knight is a 2D dungeon rogue-lite game where you can embark on a perilous journey as a knight who is tasked with uncovering the mystery of a cursed dungeon. Progress through the dungeon and unlock new weapons and spells to defeat a huge variety of enemies and challenging bosses. Use music and rhythm to time your moves and attacks in this turn-based RPG. Every run is unique, and there will be new weapons and spells as the game goes on. The game features both a story mode and endless game modes.
